turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, I'd like to get two Dominos pizzas for pickups?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, there's a special for 2 large pizzas for $5.99. Would you like to use that?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes please. I'd like one specialty cheeseburger pizza and one two topping, pepperoni and cheddar.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. We don't have any pepperoni. Could I substitute for ham?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No. Can you use Canadian bacon?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: We're out of Canadian bacon too.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. Instead of the two topping pizza, can I get a spinach and feta?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. Just to confirm, we have two large specialty pizzas, one cheeseburger and one spinach and feta.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like anything to drink with that?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, can I get a two liter Sprite?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, one two liter Sprite added. Would you like any dips or snacks?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I'd like two cups of ranch and one order of cinnamon sticks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. So, to confirm, we've got two large pizzas, one two liter of Sprite, two cups of ranch and an order of cinnamon sticks.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. How long will the order take?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The order should take 20-30 minutes. Would you like it delivered or picked up?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll take a pick up.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, to confirm, the order should be ready in 25 minutes. That'll be two specialty pizzas, one cheeseburger and one spinach and feta, a soda, ranch cups and cinnamon sticks.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. That's accurate.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, in 25 minutes, your order will be ready for pick up.
